text: what is the origin of COVID-19

metadata.narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus's origin, including its evolution, animal source, and first transmission into humans

text: how does the coronavirus respond to changes in the weather

metadata.narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus viability in different weather/climate conditions as well as information related to transmission of the virus in different climate conditions

text: will SARS-CoV2 infected people develop immunity? Is cross protection possible?

metadata.narrative: seeking studies of immunity developed due to infection with SARS-CoV2 or cross protection gained due to infection with other coronavirus types

metadata.query: how do people die from the coronavirus
metadata.narrative: Studies looking at mechanisms of death from Covid-19.

text: what drugs have been active against SARS-CoV or SARS-CoV-2 in animal studies?

metadata.narrative: Papers that describe the results  of testing drugs that bind to spike proteins of the virus or any other drugs in any animal models. Papers about SARS-CoV-2 infection in cell culture assays are also relevant.

text: what types of rapid testing for Covid-19 have been developed?

metadata.narrative: Looking for studies identifying ways to diagnose Covid-19 more rapidly.

text: are there serological tests that detect antibodies to coronavirus?

metadata.narrative: Looking for assays that measure immune response to COVID-19 that will help determine past infection and subsequent possible immunity.

text: how has lack of testing availability led to underreporting of true incidence of Covid-19?

metadata.narrative: Looking for studies answering questions of impact of lack of complete testing for Covid-19 on incidence and prevalence of Covid-19.
